name: Bulbasaur
desc: Bulbasaur is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon known for the plant bulb on its back. It evolves into Ivysaur.

name: Ivysaur
desc: Ivysaur is the evolved form of Bulbasaur, and it continues to grow its plant bulb. It eventually evolves into Venusaur.

name: Venusaur
desc: Venusaur is a fully evolved Grass/Poison-type Pokémon with a large plant bulb on its back. It can Mega Evolve and Gigantamax to enhance its abilities.

name: Charmander
desc: Charmander is a Fire-type Pokémon known for the flame at the tip of its tail. It evolves into Charmeleon.

name: Charmeleon
desc: Charmeleon is the evolved form of Charmander and has a fiery temper. It eventually evolves into Charizard.

name: Charizard
desc: Charizard is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon known for its powerful flames. It can Mega Evolve into two different forms or Gigantamax for even more power.

name: Squirtle
desc: Squirtle is a Water-type Pokémon that resembles a small turtle. It is one of the original starter Pokémon and evolves into Wartortle.

name: Wartortle
desc: Wartortle is the evolved form of Squirtle and is known for its powerful water-based attacks. It eventually evolves into Blastoise.

name: Blastoise
desc: Blastoise is a fully evolved Water-type Pokémon with powerful cannons on its shell. It can Mega Evolve and Gigantamax for extra firepower.

name: Caterpie
desc: Caterpie is a Bug-type Pokémon with a voracious appetite for leaves. It evolves into Metapod.

name: Metapod
desc: Metapod is the evolved form of Caterpie and is known for its tough shell. It eventually evolves into Butterfree.

name: Butterfree
desc: Butterfree is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its graceful wings. It can also Gigantamax to become even more majestic.
